```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)

data = read_csv('./data.csv')
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)
data %>% sample_frac(.3) -> frac

frac %>% 
  filter(`corner_pct %` > .5) %>% 
  group_by(date, home, away) %>% 
  summarise()
```
